Learn about today's Cybersecurity threats → https://ibm.biz/Bdm3Ed
Explore AI-driven cybersecurity solutions → https://ibm.biz/Bdm6p7

What happens when a new software vulnerability is discovered? If it's a bad actor you may find yourself the target of a zero day attack. In this video, Jeff Crime walks through the timeline of a zero day attack and how to best protect yourself.

Get the latest on the evolving threat landscape → https://ibm.biz/Bdm6pW
title: What is a Zero Day Threat?
